progression_balancing.description:
A system that can move progression earlier, to try and prevent the player from getting stuck and bored early.
A lower setting means more getting stuck. A higher setting means less getting stuck.

accessibility.description:
Set rules for reachability of your items/locations.
Locations: ensure everything can be reached and acquired.
Items: ensure all logically relevant items can be acquired.
Minimal: ensure what is needed to reach your goal can be acquired.

priority_locations.description: Prevent these locations from having an unimportant item

logic_rules.description: Set the logic used for the generator.

logic_no_night_tokens_without_suns_song.description: Nighttime skulltulas will logically require Sun's Song.

open_forest.description: Set the state of Kokiri Forest and the path to Deku Tree.

open_kakariko.description: Set the state of the Kakariko Village gate.

open_door_of_time.description: Open the Door of Time by default, without the Song of Time.

zora_fountain.description: Set the state of King Zora, blocking the way to Zora's Fountain.

gerudo_fortress.description: Set the requirements for access to Gerudo Fortress.

bridge.description: Set the requirements for the Rainbow Bridge.

trials.description: Set the number of required trials in Ganon's Castle.

starting_age.description: Choose which age Link will start as.

shuffle_interior_entrances.description:
Shuffles interior entrances. "Simple" shuffles houses and Great Fairies; "All" includes Windmill, Link's House,
Temple of Time, and Kak potion shop.

shuffle_dungeon_entrances.description: Shuffles dungeon entrances. Opens Deku, Fire and BotW to both ages. "All" includes Ganon's Castle.

owl_drops.description: Randomizes owl drops from Lake Hylia or Death Mountain Trail as child.

spawn_positions.description: Randomizes the starting position on loading a save. Consistent between savewarps.

shuffle_bosses.description: Shuffles boss entrances. "Limited" prevents age-mixing of bosses.

triforce_hunt.description: Gather pieces of the Triforce scattered around the world to complete the game.

triforce_goal.description: Number of Triforce pieces required to complete the game.

extra_triforce_percentage.description:
Percentage of additional Triforce pieces in the pool. With high numbers, you may need to randomize additional
locations to have enough items.

bombchus_in_logic.description:
Bombchus are properly considered in logic. The first found pack will have 20 chus; Kokiri Shop and Bazaar sell
refills; bombchus open Bombchu Bowling.

dungeon_shortcuts.description: Shortcuts to dungeon bosses are available without any requirements.

options: Water Temple
Forest Temple
Spirit Temple
Shadow Temple
Fire Temple
Dodongo's Cavern
Deku Tree
Jabu Jabu's Belly

mq_dungeons_mode.description: Choose between vanilla and Master Quest dungeon layouts.

mq_dungeons_list.description: Chosen dungeons to be MQ layout.
options: Gerudo Training Ground
Water Temple
Ganon's Castle
Forest Temple
Spirit Temple
Shadow Temple
Bottom of the Well
Ice Cavern
Fire Temple
Dodongo's Cavern
Deku Tree
Jabu Jabu's Belly

mq_dungeons_count.description: Number of MQ dungeons, chosen randomly.

bridge_stones.description: Set the number of Spiritual Stones required for the rainbow bridge.

bridge_medallions.description: Set the number of medallions required for the rainbow bridge.

bridge_rewards.description: Set the number of dungeon rewards required for the rainbow bridge.

bridge_tokens.description: Set the number of Gold Skulltula Tokens required for the rainbow bridge.

bridge_hearts.description: Set the number of hearts required for the rainbow bridge.

shuffle_mapcompass.description: Control where to shuffle dungeon maps and compasses.

shuffle_smallkeys.description: Control where to shuffle dungeon small keys.

shuffle_hideoutkeys.description: Control where to shuffle the Thieves' Hideout small keys.

shuffle_bosskeys.description: Control where to shuffle boss keys, except the Ganon's Castle Boss Key.

enhance_map_compass.description: Map tells if a dungeon is vanilla or MQ. Compass tells what the dungeon reward is.

shuffle_ganon_bosskey.description: Control how to shuffle the Ganon's Castle Boss Key.

ganon_bosskey_medallions.description: Set how many medallions are required to receive Ganon BK.

ganon_bosskey_stones.displayName: Spiritual Stones Required for Ganon's BK
ganon_bosskey_stones.description: Set how many Spiritual Stones are required to receive Ganon BK.

ganon_bosskey_rewards.displayName: Dungeon Rewards Required for Ganon's BK
ganon_bosskey_rewards.description: Set how many dungeon rewards are required to receive Ganon BK.

ganon_bosskey_tokens.description: Set how many Gold Skulltula Tokens are required to receive Ganon BK.

ganon_bosskey_hearts.description: Set how many hearts are required to receive Ganon BK.

key_rings.description: Dungeons have all small keys found at once, rather than individually.

key_rings_list.description: Select areas with keyrings rather than individual small keys.
options: Gerudo Training Ground
Water Temple
Ganon's Castle
Forest Temple
Spirit Temple
Thieves' Hideout
Shadow Temple
Bottom of the Well
Fire Temple

shopsanity.description:
Randomizes shop contents. "fixed_number" randomizes a specific number of items per shop;
"random_number" randomizes the value for each shop.

shop_slots.description:
Number of items per shop to be randomized into the main itempool.
Only active if Shopsanity is set to "fixed_number."

shopsanity_prices.description: Controls prices of shop items. "Normal" is a distribution from 0 to 300. "X Wallet" requires that wallet at max. "Affordable" is always 10 rupees.

tokensanity.description: Token rewards from Gold Skulltulas are shuffled into the pool.

shuffle_scrubs.description: Shuffle the items sold by Business Scrubs, and set the prices.

shuffle_child_trade.description: Controls the behavior of the start of the child trade quest.

shuffle_freestanding_items.description: Shuffles freestanding rupees, recovery hearts, Shadow Temple Spinning Pots, and Goron Pot.

shuffle_pots.description: Shuffles pots and flying pots which normally contain an item.

shuffle_crates.description: Shuffles large and small crates containing an item.

shuffle_cows.description: Cows give items when Epona's Song is played.

shuffle_beehives.description: Beehives drop an item when destroyed by an explosion, the Hookshot, or the Boomerang.

shuffle_kokiri_sword.description: Shuffle Kokiri Sword into the item pool.

shuffle_ocarinas.description: Shuffle the Fairy Ocarina and Ocarina of Time into the item pool.

shuffle_gerudo_card.description: Shuffle the Gerudo Membership Card into the item pool.

shuffle_beans.description: Adds a pack of 10 beans to the item pool and changes the bean salesman to sell one item for 60 rupees.

shuffle_medigoron_carpet_salesman.description: Shuffle the items sold by Medigoron and the Haunted Wasteland Carpet Salesman.

shuffle_frog_song_rupees.description: Shuffles the purple rupees received from the Zora's River frogs.

no_escape_sequence.description: Skips the tower collapse sequence between the Ganondorf and Ganon fights.

no_guard_stealth.description: The crawlspace into Hyrule Castle skips straight to Zelda.

no_epona_race.description: Epona can always be summoned with Epona's Song.

skip_some_minigame_phases.description: Dampe Race and Horseback Archery give both rewards if the second condition is met on the first attempt.

complete_mask_quest.description: All masks are immediately available to borrow from the Happy Mask Shop.

useful_cutscenes.description:
Reenables the Poe cutscene in Forest Temple, Darunia in Fire Temple, and Twinrova introduction. Mostly useful for
glitched.

fast_chests.description: All chest animations are fast. If disabled, major items have a slow animation.

free_scarecrow.description: Pulling out the ocarina near a scarecrow spot spawns Pierre without needing the song.

fast_bunny_hood.description: Bunny Hood lets you move 1.5x faster like in Majora's Mask.

plant_beans.description: Pre-plants all 10 magic beans in the soft soil spots.

chicken_count.description: Controls the number of Cuccos for Anju to give an item as child.

big_poe_count.description: Number of Big Poes required for the Poe Collector's item.

fae_torch_count.description: Number of lit torches required to open Shadow Temple.

correct_chest_appearances.description: Changes chest textures and/or sizes to match their contents. "Classic" is the old behavior of CSMC.

minor_items_as_major_chest.description: Hylian Shield, Deku Shield, and Bombchus appear in big/gold chests.

invisible_chests.description: Chests visible only with Lens of Truth. Logic is not changed.

correct_potcrate_appearances.description: Unchecked pots and crates have a different texture; unchecked beehives will wiggle. With textures_content, pots and crates have an appearance based on their contents; with textures_unchecked, all unchecked pots/crates have the same appearance.

hints.description: Gossip Stones can give hints about item locations.

misc_hints.description: The Temple of Time altar hints dungeon rewards, bridge info, and Ganon BK info; Ganondorf hints the Light Arrows; Dampe's diary hints a local Hookshot if one exists; Skulltula House locations hint their item.

hint_dist.description: Choose the hint distribution to use. Affects the frequency of strong hints, which items are always hinted, etc.

text_shuffle.description: Randomizes text in the game for comedic effect.

damage_multiplier.description: Controls the amount of damage Link takes.

deadly_bonks.description: Bonking on a wall or object will hurt Link. "Normal" is a half heart of damage.

no_collectible_hearts.description: Hearts will not drop from enemies or objects.

starting_tod.description: Change the starting time of day.

blue_fire_arrows.description: Ice arrows can melt red ice and break the mud walls in Dodongo's Cavern.

fix_broken_drops.description: Fixes two broken vanilla drops: deku shield in child Spirit Temple, and magic drop on GTG eye statue.

start_with_consumables.description: Start the game with full Deku Sticks and Deku Nuts.

start_with_rupees.description: Start with a full wallet. Wallet upgrades will also fill your wallet.

item_pool_value.description: Changes the number of items available in the game.

junk_ice_traps.description: Adds ice traps to the item pool.

ice_trap_appearance.description: Changes the appearance of ice traps as freestanding items.

adult_trade_start.description: Choose the items that can appear to start the adult trade sequence. By default it is Claim Check only.
options: Pocket Cucco
Claim Check
Pocket Egg
Prescription
Eyeball Frog
Cojiro
Eyedrops
Odd Mushroom
Broken Sword
Poacher's Saw

display_dpad.description: Show dpad icon on HUD for quick actions (ocarina, hover boots, iron boots).

dpad_dungeon_menu.description: Show separated menus on the pause screen for dungeon keys, rewards, and Vanilla/MQ info.

correct_model_colors.description: Makes in-game models match their HUD element colors.

ocarina_fanfares.description: Enable ocarina songs as fanfares. These are longer than usual fanfares. Does nothing without fanfares randomized.

kokiri_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

goron_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

zora_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

silver_gauntlets_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

golden_gauntlets_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

mirror_shield_frame_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

navi_color_default_inner.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

navi_color_default_outer.description:
Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.
"match_inner" copies the inner color for this option.

navi_color_prop_outer.description:
Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.
"match_inner" copies the inner color for this option.

sword_trail_duration.description: Set the duration for sword trails.

sword_trail_color_inner.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

bombchu_trail_color_inner.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

bombchu_trail_color_outer.description:

boomerang_trail_color_outer.description:
Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.
"match_inner" copies the inner color for this option.

heart_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

magic_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

a_button_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

b_button_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

c_button_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

start_button_color.description: Choose a color. "random_choice" selects a random option. "completely_random" generates a random hex code.

sfx_navi_overworld.description:
Choose a sound effect. "random_choice" selects a random option. "random_ear_safe" selects a random safe option.
"completely_random" selects any random sound.

sfx_navi_enemy.description:
Choose a sound effect. "random_choice" selects a random option. "random_ear_safe" selects a random safe option.
"completely_random" selects any random sound.

sfx_low_hp.description:
Choose a sound effect. "random_choice" selects a random option. "random_ear_safe" selects a random safe option.
"completely_random" selects any random sound.

sfx_menu_cursor.description:
Choose a sound effect. "random_choice" selects a random option. "random_ear_safe" selects a random safe option.
"completely_random" selects any random sound.

sfx_menu_select.description:
Choose a sound effect. "random_choice" selects a random option. "random_ear_safe" selects a random safe option.
"completely_random" selects any random sound.

sfx_nightfall.description:
Choose a sound effect. "random_choice" selects a random option. "random_ear_safe" selects a random safe option.
"completely_random" selects any random sound.

sfx_horse_neigh.description:
Choose a sound effect. "random_choice" selects a random option. "random_ear_safe" selects a random safe option.
"completely_random" selects any random sound.

sfx_hover_boots.description:
Choose a sound effect. "random_choice" selects a random option. "random_ear_safe" selects a random safe option.
"completely_random" selects any random sound.

sfx_ocarina.description: Change the sound of the ocarina.

logic_tricks.description:
Set various tricks for logic in Ocarina of Time.
Format as a comma-separated list of "nice" names: ["Fewer Tunic Requirements", "Hidden Grottos without Stone of Agony"].
A full list of supported tricks can be found at:
https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/oot/LogicTricks.py

death_link.description: When you die, everyone dies. Of course the reverse is true too.
